meanings.definition: To tame or train, especially an animal
meanings.sent1: She gentled the wild horse with patience and care.
meanings.sent2: The trainer gentled the fierce lion, earning its trust.
meanings.sent3: The magician gentled the ferocious tiger with a simple gesture.
meanings.sent4: The dog gentled its behavior after consistent training sessions.
meanings.sent5: The zookeeper gentled the skittish bird, teaching it to perch on her hand.
